import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { fetchStudentById } from "../services/studentServices" export const StudentEditForm = () => { const [editStudent, setEditStudent] = useState({}) const { studentId } = useParams() const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchStudentById(studentId).then((data) => { setEditStudent(data) }) } const handleInput = () => { "" } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [studentId]) return (

Add New Student

) }
